name: Anjali R
quote: This Malayalam travel book felt like a calm conversation with my own thoughts. The silence, journeys and people in it stayed with me long after I finished reading.

name: Tijo John
quote: Not just a travelogue — it’s a journey inward. Simple but powerful writing. Every place described felt real and meaningful.

name: Sruthi A. Nair
quote: Finished this in two sittings. The way he connects border crossings, strangers and silence felt very personal. It reads like a quiet conversation during a long bus journey.

name: Vivek Menon
quote: A different kind of travelogue – very honest and grounded. You can almost feel the backpack, cheap hostels and long walks through unknown streets.

name: Jithin John
quote: No over-dramatic descriptions, just simple narration that slowly pulls you into each country. Good pick if you like reflective travel writing in Malayalam.
